title: How frogs went from right-wing meme to anti-ICE protest symbol
description: The frog has become a frequent symbol at protests against the Trump administration.
content:
The revolution will not be televised, but it might have webbed feet and bulging eyes.
It also might have a unicorn's horn or a chicken's feathers.

title: Rich and voiceless: How Putin has kept Russia's billionaires on side in the war
description: Western sanctions have failed to turn the uber-rich into opponents, and Putin's policies have turned them into silent backers.
content:
During the war with Ukraine, the number of billionaires in Russia has reached an all-time high. But in the 25 years Vladimir Putin has been in power, Russia's rich and powerful - known as oligarchs - have lost almost all their political influence.

title: Israel criticised after becoming first country to formally recognise Somaliland as independent nation
description: Somalia's government condemned Israel's move as an "unlawful step" and a "deliberate attack" on its sovereignty, with the prime minister's office rejecting any recognition of Somaliland.
content:
Israel has been criticised after it became the first country to formally recognise Somalia's breakaway region of Somaliland as an independent nation.
